title: AI and CV based 2D-CNN algorithm: botanical authentication of Indian honey
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,373-385
DOI: 10.1039/D3FB00170A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Dilpreet Singh Brar, Ashwani Kumar Aggarwal, Vikas Nanda, Sudhanshu Saxena, Satyendra Gautam
A deep learning framework based on the 2D-CNN model and an inexpensive and robust analysis methodology based on computer vision (CV) was used for the botanical authentication of Indian unifloral honey varieties.
